body_html:
Hello, I was having the same problem and was searching internet for same problem. In my case upgrading pip from 7.1.2 to 10.0.1 (the latest one) worked.
Use the following command and then try again.

  1. python -m pip install --upgrade pip
  2. pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
body_text:
Hello, I was having the same problem and was searching internet for same problem. In my case upgrading pip from 7.1.2 to 10.0.1 (the latest one) worked.
Use the following command and then try again.

python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
body:
Hello, I was having the same problem and was searching internet for same problem. In my case upgrading pip from 7.1.2 to 10.0.1 (the latest one) worked. 
Use the following command and then try again. 

1. python -m pip install --upgrade pip
2. pip3 install --upgrade tensorflow
